author: tniessen
message:
crypto: assign missing deprecation code

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/22827
Refs: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/22747
Reviewed-By: Vse Mozhet Byt <vsemozhetbyt@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: James M Snell <jasnell@gmail.com>

files.patch: @@ -2184,8 +2184,8 @@ The [Legacy URL API][] is deprecated. This includes [`url.format()`][], [`url.parse()`][], [`url.resolve()`][], and the [legacy `urlObject`][]. Please use the [WHATWG URL API][] instead. - -### DEP00XX: Native crypto handles + +### DEP0117: Native crypto handles
